column6: Just in time for the ANT-MAN movie (funny, that), it's the team-up you've been waiting for: Scott Lang and Hank Pym, together again! Ant-bros! A classic villain makes his dreaded return! And a new hero is born! Well, not born, really -- he's already an adult. Nobody wants to read about a super-baby. (Or do they?)
column8: | penciller (cover):David Marquez | artist:Ramon Rosasnas | artist:Brent Schoonover | writer:Nick Spencer
